document.full_text: a tibetan buddhist monk burned himself to death in western china on wednesday, triggering a street protest against government controls on the restive region, a group campaigning for tibetan self-rule said.
document.title: tibetan monk burns to death in china protest: group
lines_and_colors: a tibetan buddhist monk burned himself to death in western china on wednesday, triggering a street protest against government controls on the restive region, a group campaigning for tibetan self-rule said.
